name: Evacuation (itch) (armond_rivera)
description:
Goal:

Find a way off the ship.

Controls:

Use arrow keys to move

Use space to interact with doors

Design Challenges:

  • At first the original idea was to have a platformer with obstacles in the way, however when I combined this with doors that lead to different sections of the ship, it felt tedious when trying to get to the next door.
  • When I added music during play testing, I had spent a large amount of time trying to get the music to play correctly, and finding the right type of music took some time as well.
